about_the_game:
“Our goal? To create the greatest, pervy furry porn game of all time, that only a doujin group could ever hope to accomplish! But that is no easy task, and the expectations are sky high.” - Dev Team (Toki no Kogiri)

Haruki's crush is coming over to his house for a study session tomorrow. Obviously he wants everything to go off without a hitch, so he intends to spend his whole Saturday preparing for her upcoming visit.

But his step-sister, Anne, has other plans in mind. Her goal is to toy with Haruki as much as possible, and she knows full well that she can do that with ease. And she's not the only one with malicious plans. His step-mother, Madoka, is prepared to make some advances of her own, and she's positive her temptations will prove irresistible.

And escaping the house won't help either—everywhere Haruki goes, there's a horny woman who seems to want nothing more than to get into  his pants!

Haruki's resolve will be put to the test, and the day's only just begun...

  • Classic dating sim gameplay, with map movement and time management.

  • A plethora of choices, with more than 10 unique heroines to mingle and get sexy with! 

  • 10+ hours of gameplay with 30+ fully uncensored sex scenes.

  • Art by DANGAN, plus an all-star cast of guest character artists including: Kishibe, Mabo, Sindoll, Kiichi, Kame, Kikunoya, INAX, 7010, ro, Suurin, Yo-na, Ohakotome, and Toki!

  • Minigames galore!

  • Multiple endings influenced by your actions. Everyone wants your cock, so don't hesitate to let your lust get the best of you. Or feel free to go for a perfect score and ensure you'll have the best study session of all time!

Above all… this is a game made by furry lovers, for our likeminded furry lovers.

A laidback guy who just wants to enjoy life. He's having a hard time adjusting to life after his dad's recent marriage; why do his new step-mom and step-sister have to be so attractive?!

Also taking up his attention is his crush, and he has the perfect opportunity to impress her with their upcoming study session. Haruki's got a whole day to prep to make sure it goes perfectly, but he has a long list of things to do, and there'll be plenty of distractions along the way...

Haruki's step-sister. A fun-loving chick with a banging body. She loves to fuck, and she's always on the prowl for a cock to satisfy her needs. She's close to Haruki in age, but in terms of experience, she's on another level. Though they've only been step-siblings for a month, she's already bored of just teasing him, and now it's time for the fruits of her lusty labor to pay off.

Haruki's step-mother. At a glance, she seems like your average, goodhearted housewife. However, her true nature is anything but. She's a carnivore who preys on and devours men, and the primary reason she and her previous husband divorced is because he couldn't keep up with her. Unsurprisingly, she wants a piece of Haruki as well, and she'll use her stacked body and tempting antics to make him sweat like he never has before.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains graphic sexual content featuring furry characters, including depictions of oral and penetrative sex,
